strong.span: UPDATED- SEE LINKS BELOW FOR HOME LEARNING EXPECTATIONS AND FOOD SERVICE OPERATIONS

div.a: Fairfield Local

img.title: 1/9/19 - Ron Friend Received the Heritage Award from Great Oaks
img.alt: Ron Friend Received the Heritage Award from Great Oaks

div.a: ATTENTION SENIORS

p.img: Jostens will be delivering cap/gowns and other senior items that you may have ordered on Tuesday, April 28th from 10:00 a.m.-12:00 noon. They will be set up outside the high school main entrance under the awning.

span.p:
You will be hearing from Jostens if you owe a balance on items that you ordered.
Additionally, if you owe school fees, please contact Mrs. Jones. You will not receive your diploma until they are paid in full.

div.a: prom

img.br: The 2020 Junior/Senior Prom has been rescheduled to July 11th with the hope that the dance can occur safely for all participants. Further details will be released closer to the event date. Fairfield Schools will continue to follow the guidelines as outlined by Governor DeWine.

div.a: KINDERGARTEN REGISTRTION

p.img: Kindergarten Registration packets will be available beginning on April 22nd inside the district office foyer. Completed packets with the necessary documents may be returned to district office on April 28th 4:00 pm - 6:00 pm, April 29th and April 30 from 8:00 am -12:00 pm. Packets must include official birth certificate, immunization record or form, student’s social security card, proof of custody (if applicable), IEP or special ed records (if applicable), and proof of residence. Accepted proof of residence documents include utility bill (electric, water, gas), purchase agreement, rent receipt, lease agreement. Please send copies of the necessary documents. If you must submit the original documents, they will be returned at the beginning of the 2020-2021 school year. Please email Mrs. Cloud with any questions at angie.cloud@fairfieldlocal.org

div.a: OPEN ENROLLMENT

span.p:
We are now accepting applications for Open Enrollment for the 2020-2021 school year. If your child is currently attending Fairfield Local Schools under open enrollment, you will receive an application in the mail. If you are new to open enrollment, click here for more information.
If you have any questions regarding the Open Enrollment process, please contact Amy B. by calling 937-780-2221 and leave a message. You may also send an email to amy.b@fairfieldlocal.org.

div.a: 2019-2020 HIGH SCHOOL YEARBOOKS

span.p: It's not too late to order the 2019-2020 high school yearbook! Yearbooks are $60 for the remainder of the school year and can be purchased online at yearbookforever.com A very limited number of extra yearbooks will be available in the fall. Don't take any chances! Order yours today! 2020 SENIORS - YOUR YEARBOOKS HAVE BEEN PURCHASED FOR YOU!

div.a: HOME LEARNING CONTINUES

span.p: REMINDER TO STUDENTS: Our at home learning resumes tomorrow, Tuesday April 14th. Please remember to check your email, Progress Book, Study Island and Google Classroom on a regular basis for your assignments. If you have any questions, please email your teachers directly or call the office and leave a voice mail.

div.a: FROM THE SUPERINTENDENT...

span.strong: April 3, 2020 -- Please click on the "Superintendent's Message" in upper right corner of page.

div.a: COMMUNITY SURVEY

span.p:
STRATEGIC PLAN SURVEY - A strategic plan is a vehicle that allows an organization to look to the future. We have created a survey that asks for our community's assistance in creating this tool. We have outlined our goals and initiatives in 5 Areas of Focus - Student Achievement, Climate and Culture, Communication, Resources and Partnerships. Please take a few minutes to complete this survey. Your comments are valuable and appreciated. To complete online, click here: STRATEGIC PLAN SURVEY.
If you need a printed copy, please call 937-780-2221. Leave a message with your name and phone number and we will call you back. You may also send an email request to: amy.b@fairfieldlocal.org Click here to view the full Strategic Plan Document/Outline.

div.a: FREE PHYSICALS

span.p: Adena will once again be offering free physicals to the athletes of Fairfield Local Schools. The clinic is scheduled for Saturday, May 16th from 8-10am and will be held at the Adena Greenfield Family Practice office (1075 N. Washington St. Greenfield). Students need to bring the printed OHSAA Sports Physical form with their portion completed. Click here for the 2020-2021 OHSAA Sports Physical Form.
